name: "High School Musical 2" Quiz | High School Musical Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Chad's t-shirt say at the beginning of this movie?
questions.explanation:
I majored in vacation.

	In the very beginning of the movie, Chad wears a shirt that says 'I majored in vacation.' The song sung is called "What Time is it?" and the song asks what time it is, and everybody sings "It's our vacation!"

questions.text: What does Coach Bolton tell everybody that Troy does when Gabriella calls?
questions.explanation:
Blushes.

	Coach Bolton tells the team that Troy blushes when Gabriella calls, so it couldn't have been her on the phone.  Everybody laughs and the coach doesn't want anybody to tell Troy he said that.

questions.text: What is Jason's job when Troy is eating dinner with Sharpay and her family?
questions.explanation:
Waiter.

	When Troy isn't working, there is only one waiter.  This would be Chad.  Fulton has Jason assist Chad as a waiter since Troy is eating dinner.

questions.text: What color is Gabriella's lifeguard swimsuit?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	She first saves Sharpay when she falls in the swimming pool.  She doesn't like the fact that Gabriella is there.  She was hoping for only Troy.

questions.text: What kind of trophy do Sharpay and Ryan both want to win?
questions.explanation:
Star Dazzle Award.

	The trophy that both Sharpay and Ryan want to win is a pink sparkly star.  Ryan has never won one before, because Sharpay always takes them.

questions.text: Which of the following games was not in "High School Musical 2"?
questions.explanation:
Football.

	Basketball is featured in this movie, just like in the first one.  The Wildcats are a basketball team.  When Chad asks Ryan if he's got game, Ryan answers, "A little."  He was saying that he could play baseball, because it was similar to dancing.  When Sharpay's dad realized how good Troy was at golf, he gave him a promotion to teach golf to younger ones.  There was no football.

questions.text: What kind of shoes is Troy excited to get with his promotion?
questions.explanation:
Italian.

	When he learns of the promotion and what it pays, he got really excited.  Gabriella didn't like the fact that he told Sharpay about the shoes before he told her.

questions.text: Which is NOT an actress who appears in this movie?
questions.explanation:
They all appear.

	Miley Cyrus is in the movie, but only briefly.  At the very end, you see her dancing to the music with all the others by the swimming pool.  Vanessa Anne Hudgens plays Gabriella and Monique Coleman plays Taylor.

questions.text: What kind of sandwich did Troy make for Gabriella?
questions.explanation:
PB&J.

	Troy makes a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for Gabriella.  However, Sharpay and Ryan saw them picnicking, and had Fulton turn on the sprinkler system, so she never did eat it.

questions.text: Did Chad and Gabriella actually ever kiss in this movie?
questions.explanation:
No.

	No, of course not!  Chad and Gabriella never dated.  However, Gabriella and Troy kissed.  Chad went out with Taylor.
